channel.title: Development team, Project Name (not yet known)
channel.description:
Hello. Some of you are probably wondering why is some new guy making a dev team post? Well I have older accounts but I don't feel like blowing off dust from old books.
So this server will be a group project. The reason why no source, images, name, or anything has been released is because I think my team should help decide that.
I am here for that team, I will be coding, and making all graphic design/propaganda.
The source will more or likely be, PI or Delta depending on my teams skill set.
The type of server will be dependent on the team, either a Remake, Eco, pk, Eco+Pk, or Spawn.
First these are the requirements to apply, [i]Mature, 13+ Polite Easy to work with others Good Listener Work Efficiently Be on at least 3 times a week [/i]
Now for the open spots and duties of these spots. Coder: 0/3 [size=7pt](Work will be evenly distributed giving all coders equal credit)[/size] Hoster: 0/1 [size=7pt](To host 24/7, so that the server status page on mopar stays at 100%, Must be reliable)[/size] Web Designer: 0/1 [size=7pt](To create a web with stand alone domain, either free such as dot.tk or co.cc or a purchased domain. If web designer doesn't develop a nice enough website/forums then I will take that role.)[/size] Video Editor: 0/1 [size=7pt](Create and Edit Videos to upload to YouTube, some cases to edit prerecorded videos)[/size] Beta Tester: 0/4 [size=7pt](To test out the server before release, this is so we can fix bugs/glitches/dupes and all, you will be required to try all duping, glitches, bugs that you can think of and report them so we may fix)[/size]
About myself(for those who wish to know who they work with) I am 15, I live in Eastern United States, I know how to code even though I might be rusty from a long time away from private servers in general but I won't slow anyone down :P, I do GFX, such as here [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ne9a35.jpg[/img] I am a overall active, nice kid who just wants to stop playing shit servers and actually make a good one like the olden days when it was just 317, and it was basic good old RSPS. So please help me do that.
I will be adding info such as images, source, name, and all other information when the team is started.
Now for the Application. [size=8pt]Name: Skype: Age: Country: Spot Applying For: Experience: Proof of work: [/size]
Required Programs Skype: [size=7pt]https://login.skype.com/account/signup-form?application=download&return_url=http://www.skype.com/go/buy-credit%3Fflow=join&intcmp=join[/size] Dropbox(Coder,Hoster Only): [size=7pt]https://www.dropbox.com/downloading?src=index[/size]
Thank You for taking the time to read this.
Contact Me Skype: DubbinStep Email: dreemdubstep@gmail.com

item.title: Development team, Project Name (not yet known)
item.dc:creator: @DubbinStep DubbinStep
item.description:
@DubbinStep wrote:

Hello.
Some of you are probably wondering why is some new guy making a dev team post? Well I have older accounts but I don’t feel like blowing off dust from old books.

So this server will be a group project. The reason why no source, images, name, or anything has been released is because I think my team should help decide that.

I am here for that team, I will be coding, and making all graphic design/propaganda.

The source will more or likely be, PI or Delta depending on my teams skill set.

The type of server will be dependent on the team, either a Remake, Eco, pk, Eco+Pk, or Spawn.

First these are the requirements to apply,
Mature,
13+
Polite
Easy to work with others
Good Listener
Work Efficiently
Be on at least 3 times a week

Now for the open spots and duties of these spots.
Coder: 0/3 [size=7pt](Work will be evenly distributed giving all coders equal credit)[/size]
Hoster: 0/1 [size=7pt](To host 24/7, so that the server status page on mopar stays at 100%, Must be reliable)[/size]
Web Designer: 0/1 [size=7pt](To create a web with stand alone domain, either free such as dot.tk or co.cc or a purchased domain. If web designer doesn’t develop a nice enough website/forums then I will take that role.)[/size]
Video Editor: 0/1 [size=7pt](Create and Edit Videos to upload to YouTube, some cases to edit prerecorded videos)[/size]
Beta Tester: 0/4 [size=7pt](To test out the server before release, this is so we can fix bugs/glitches/dupes and all, you will be required to try all duping, glitches, bugs that you can think of and report them so we may fix)[/size]

About myself(for those who wish to know who they work with)
I am 15, I live in Eastern United States, I know how to code even though I might be rusty from a long time away from private servers in general but I won’t slow anyone down :P, I do GFX, such as here
I am a overall active, nice kid who just wants to stop playing shit servers and actually make a good one like the olden days when it was just 317, and it was basic good old RSPS. So please help me do that.

I will be adding info such as images, source, name, and all other information when the team is started.

Now for the Application.
[size=8pt]Name:
Skype:
Age:
Country:
Spot Applying For:
Experience:
Proof of work:
[/size]

Required Programs
Skype: [size=7pt]https://login.skype.com/account/signup-form?application=download&return_url=http://www.skype.com/go/buy-credit%3Fflow=join&intcmp=join[/size]
Dropbox(Coder,Hoster Only): [size=7pt]https://www.dropbox.com/downloading?src=index[/size]

Thank You for taking the time to read this.
